named-native-query.name: TransferenciaModel.buscaPorDataRelatorio
named-native-query.query: select * from NFP_ContaCorrente..Transferencia where cast(dtGeracaoRelatorio as date) = ?1

named-native-query.name: TransferenciaModel.buscaTodos
named-native-query.query: select * from NFP_ContaCorrente..Transferencia order by dtGeracaoRelatorio

named-native-query.name: TransferenciaModel.atualizaParaInvalida
named-native-query.query: update NFP_ContaCorrente..Transferencia set tra_status = -1 where tra_status in (0, 1) and pkTransf = ?1

named-native-query.name: TransferenciaModel.atualizaParaConferencia
named-native-query.query: update NFP_ContaCorrente..Transferencia set tra_status = 1 where codBanco = 47 and tra_status = 0

named-native-query.name: TransferenciaModel.atualizaParaResgate
named-native-query.query: update NFP_ContaCorrente..Transferencia set tra_status = 2, dtGeracaoRelatorio = getdate() where codBanco = 47 and tra_status = 1
